entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
